meanings.definition: Proposing someone for a position or office.
meanings.sent1: She is nominating her friend for class president.
meanings.sent2: The committee will be nominating candidates for the job opening.
meanings.sent3: By nominating her cat for mayor, she brought humor to the election.
meanings.sent4: The sun nominating the flower for the title of 'brightest in the garden'.
meanings.sent5: Nominating a friend is like giving them a golden ticket to opportunity.

meanings.definition: Designating someone as a candidate for an award or honor.
meanings.sent1: The nominating committee selected the top three candidates.
meanings.sent2: She received a nominating letter for the prestigious award.
meanings.sent3: Wearing a nominating badge, she felt like a star.
meanings.sent4: The nominating spotlight shone on the outstanding student.
meanings.sent5: Her nominating smile lit up the room with pride.
